description: Silvery-blue metal greaves enchanted with ice magic. Created by the Lossoth, the snow-men of Forochel who dwell in the frozen wastes of the north. The metal was shaped from meteoric iron that fell in a glacier and tempered in meltwater from ancient ice. These greaves become harder and more protective in freezing temperatures, making them ideal for arctic warriors.
name: Glacial Warden Greaves
